p1_background: Jack is a freelance graphic designer who has been struggling to find consistent work. He has been relying on odd jobs to make ends meet and is currently behind on his rent.
p2_background: Rose is a successful businesswoman who owns her own marketing company. She has a stable income and is financially secure.
p1_goal: Jack's goal is to borrow enough money from Rose to pay his rent and avoid getting evicted from his apartment.
p2_goal: Rose's goal is to help Jack out but also ensure that she will get her money back in a timely manner without damaging their friendship.
